### Gnome, Deep

_Gray-skinned, white-haired fey the size of halflings. They hunt for gems and rare cave flora._

**LV** 3, **AL** L
**AC** 14, **HP** 14, **MV** near
**ATK** 1 pick +3 (1d6) or 1 dart (near) +2 (1d4)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| 2 | 1 | 1 | 1 | 1 | 1 |

**Stone Meld:** 2/day, underground only. Turn invisible for 3 rounds.
